channel.title: Vestibule :: Suggestions for "The Ruby workflow or: Less workflow, more Ruby."
channel.description: A list of all suggestions made for "The Ruby workflow or: Less workflow, more Ruby."

item.title: Suggestion from the proposer
item.description: Thanks, Nikos. I think I made a list of tools instead of really describing the process. I will post a new version in a bit!

item.title: Suggestion from Nikos Dimitrakopoulos (@)
item.description: Hey author! This talk looks really promising, but can you give some more examples on how you achieved all this? I'm pretty sure that by just having git, a full test suite and a CI server is not enough...
